roleset.name: stealing in the middle of transmission

example.name: arg1
example.text: This would allow the monitoring and possible interception of any vessel within the zone .
example.arg: of any vessel within the zone

example.name: with arg2
example.text: The prime objective of any Communication Technique is not only to make the communication clear, efficient and noise free but also to make the communication well secured from its interception from unauthorized users in both commercial as well as in defense communication.

example.name: with arg3
example.text: ...as long as the communication had been transmitted by radio at some point prior to its interception from the cable system.

example.name: args0, 1
example.text: This reduces the risk of interception of the pass by the opponent.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, intercept.01. Corresponds to VNcls confront-98
